background.description: A vibrant, sun-drenched riverbank teeming with tall green reeds gives way to a wide, gently flowing river under a clear blue sky. A ancient, moss-covered tree stump sits at the edge of the water.

characters.name: Frog
characters.appearance: A plump, emerald-green frog with prominent golden eyes, smooth, wet-looking skin, and broad webbed feet, poised near the river's edge.

characters.name: Scorpion
characters.appearance: A compact, charcoal-black scorpion with a glossy, segmented exoskeleton, sharp, articulated pincers, and a deadly, segmented tail arcing over its back, tipped with a glistening stinger.

dialogues.line: Oh, noble Frog, I beg your assistance! This vast river blocks my path, and I, a creature of the land, cannot swim. Would you ferry me across?
A scorpion? On my back? Are you daft? You will surely sting me, and then we both shall drown in the depths of this river!
Preposterous, my friend! Consider the logic. If I sting you, my ride, we both perish. My survival is entirely dependent on yours. Why would I jeopardize us both?
Your words, though chilling, hold a grim truth. Very well, climb aboard, but make no sudden movements!
A thousand thanks, kind Frog! You shall not regret this act of unparalleled generosity.
(yelping, a sharp pain in its back) Why? Why did you sting me, despite your promise?
I... I couldn't help myself. It is simply my nature. Now, we both face the inevitable. Forgive me, if you can, for what I truly am.
